posts.caption: hubot.github.com
posts.description: GitHub, Inc., wrote the first version of Hubot to automate our company chat room. Hubot knew how to deploy the site, automate a lot of tasks, and be a source of fun in the company. Eventually he grew to become a formidable force in GitHub. But he led a private, messy life. So we rewrote him.

Jodod Technology Labs is looking for a skilled development team lead in Mansoura, Egypt. They will lead a highly competent team and will be responsible of delivering high quality software and meeting hard deadlines. They will also be responsible of critical technical decisions, maintaining the team harmony and skills diversity and orchestrating daily work between different team members. Jodod Technology Labs uses open source software and follows an agile development approach.
--
Requirements:
--
----Highly skilled with strong experience in one or more of the following languages: Python, Ruby or Java.
----Strong experience in web technologies and frameworks such as Django, Ruby on Rails, J2EE, GWT, ...etc.
----Strong experience of the Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong experience in developing over Linux/Unix operating systems.
----Strong knowledge in object oriented analysis and design.
----Familiar with agile methodologies, test driven development and SCRUM.
----Well disciplined with strong communication skills and a fast learner who can adapt to a rapidly changing environment.
--
Candidates can send their resume to jobs@jodod.com with the subject of "Team Lead".
Technical project manager required for web and mobile apps.
posts.description:
We are hiring a Technical Project Manager.

-> Responsibilities:

•	Assign resources to projects while monitoring and tracking the progress for individual project engagements.
•	Participate in the creation of user acceptance criteria.
•	Manage and update task objectives and performance while helping to ensure that project commitments are met as specified in the client contract.
•	Manage project budget to revenue, and costs.
•	Develop new business within projects and identify new business elsewhere in the client environment.
•	Assist with preparation of the statement of work as well the delivery of the quality assurance review.

-> Desired Skills, Experience and Qualifications :

•	Bachelor’s degree from a top institution or a relevant degree. 
•	1-2 years relevant work experience.
•	Familiarity with project management tools and software.
•	Experience with agile development and its methodology is a plus.
•	PMP certification a plus.
•	Flexible, adaptive and responsive to project changes.
•	Excellent communication, analytical and problem solving skills.
•	Able to utilize Web technologies and Development tools.
•	Able to quickly learn company technologies and tools.
•	Familiar with industry standards.
•	Capable of working independently with little supervision.
•	Technical writing,Teaching/training and performance measuring.
•	Is experienced in managing relationships with multiple vendors and departments.
•	Experience in developing web-based tools.
•	Self-motivated with strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
•	Strong team player with the ability to prioritize and thrive in a fast paced environment .

Interested ? Apply using this form: http://bit.ly/1jLsfPe

posts.message:
Richard M. Stallman, Linus Thorvalds, and Donald E. Knuth engage in a discussion on whose impact on the computerized world was the greatest.
Stallman: "God told me I have programmed the best editor in the world!"
Thorvalds: "Well, God told me that I have programmed the best operating system in the world!"
Knuth: "Wait, wait - I never said that."
